long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Navigate to Salesforce's Object Manager with a Single Click! 🚀
Are you a Salesforce admin or developer tired of navigating through multiple clicks to reach the Object Manager? Save time and clicks with our "One Click Salesforce Object Manager" extension! 🕒

🌟 Why You Should Install This Extension 🌟
🎯 Efficiency: Skip the menu maze and get straight to the Object Manager with just one click.
🌍 Universal: Works on any Salesforce org you're logged into, be it custom or sandbox domains.
🔧 Simplicity: No setup required. Just install, and you're good to go!
🔒 Secure: We don't collect any data. Your Salesforce credentials and activities stay private.
👉 Get your time back and streamline your Salesforce workflow today! 👈
